price: Reci: "Da li je bolje to ili vječni Džennet, koji je obećan bogobojaznima? On će im nagrada i prebivalište biti."
arabic: قُلۡ أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ جَنَّةُ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ ٱلَّتِي وُعِدَ ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَۚ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَمَصِيرٗا

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: qul adhālika khayrun am jannatu al-khul'di allatī wuʿida al-mutaqūna kānat lahum jazāan wamaṣīran
